actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage of qualified acupuncturist services under part B of the medicare program, and to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for coverage of such services under the Federal Employees Health Benefits Program.
short_title: Patient Access to Acupuncture Services Act of 1998

summary.text: Patient Access to Acupuncture Services Act of 1998 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage of qualified acupuncturist services under Medicare part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance). Amends Federal civil service law to provide for coverage of acupuncturist services under the Federal Employees Health Benefits Program.

titles.title: Patient Access to Acupuncture Services Act of 1998

A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage of qualified acupuncturist services under part B of the medicare program, and to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for coverage of such services under the Federal Employees Health Benefits Program.
